ai-patthana14.14:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.14:1.1_0: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the cause and reason.
ai-patthana14.14:2.1_0: Neither understands the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom.
ai-patthana14.14:2.1_1: Neither understands the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom.
ai-patthana14.14:2.1_2: Why don’t arise dependent on the undefiled and the causes and conditions for the reason.
ai-patthana14.14:3.1_0: Defiled by Defilements Given Up by Dispelling
ai-patthana14.14:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
